/** *

This class provides an easy way for a user to preparse grammars * of various types. By default, it knows how to preparse external * DTD's and schemas; it provides an easy way for user applications to * register classes that know how to parse additional grammar types. * By default, it does no grammar caching; but it provides ways for * user applications to do so. * * @author Neil Graham, IBM * * @version $Id: XMLGrammarPreparser.java,v 1.10 2004/03/25 04:03:23 mrglavas Exp $ */
